summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1415, for the improvement of the alley in Block two (2), Boren's & Denny's Addition to the Town (now City) of Seattle, being the alley between Second Avenue and Third Avenue, from James Street to Jefferson Street, by paving the same with brick laid upon a proper concrete foundation, under Ordinance No. 15357 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
